mapper.insert: insert into item values(#{ code }, #{ type1 }, #{ type2 }, #{ brand }, #{ name }, #{ wup }, #{ uup })
mapper.update: update item set type1 = #{ type1 }, type2 = #{ type2 }, brand = #{ brand }, name = #{ name }, wup = #{ wup }, uup = #{ uup } where code = #{ code }
mapper.select: select * from item where code = #{ code }
select * from item where type2 = #{ type2 } order by code asc
select * from item order by code asc
select * from item where name like #{ keyword } || '%' and type2 like #{ type2 } and (uup >= #{ lowest_price } and uup <= #{ highest_price }) order by code asc
select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from item order by code asc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from item where code like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or type1 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or type2 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or brand like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by code asc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}

select count(*) from item where code like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or type1 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or type2 like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or brand like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
